themeOneFeatureSection.heading: There is a little bit of home everywhere you go.
themeOneFeatureSection.headingText: Easy access to your local products and services.

featureData.title: Grocery stores
featureData.text: Choose from numerous culturally diverse stores to shop from on Haydac.

featureData.title: Restaurants
featureData.text: No need to miss local cuisines from your home country. Find them in one of the intercontinental restaurants on Haydac.

featureData.title: Businesses
featureData.text: Find local businesses waiting to offer you unique services on Haydac.

themeOneServiceSection.heading: Let haydac Find Everything You Need
themeOneServiceSection.headingTwo: Share your photos with friends easily
themeOneServiceSection.headingFive: Organize all your media content easily
themeOneServiceSection.headingSeven: Stay connected with all of your friends

serviceData.text: A service that utilizes your location to suggest nearby businesses and provide directions to them, including the option for delivery.
Save and sort businesses to suit your preference..
Our users have the opportunity to leave reviews and guide other users.

themeOneDiscoverSection.heading: Haydac connects you with local businesses around you.

discoverData.text: Businesses can upload their services on Haydac to increase their outreach.
Addresses have been provided to show you their exact location, and a button to navigate you on how to get there.
Contact details are provided so you can enquire about their product and services available.

workData.title: Install the App
workData.content: Open up a new source of income.

workData.title: Setup your profile
workData.content: Add the necessary information to get you up and running.

themeOneAboutUs.heading: What is Haydac?
themeOneAboutUs.headingText: Haydac provides you with information on the many local businesses in your area as well as step-by-step directions on how to get there.
themeOneAboutUs.story: Meet Fikayo, Fikayo is an international student from Nigeria that arrived in Canada in the winter semester to resume studying in 8 days time. Fikayo is tired of eating burger and fries and misses the local cuisines he usually enjoyed back home, Fikayo has no Nigerian friends and can't find Nigerian stores or restaurants in his area. And yes, Fikayo has tried searching on Uber Eats and Google but the apps only lead him to generic African stores that do not have Nigerian made products. Fikayo is hungry and home sick! What should Fikayo do? Fikayo should definitely download Haydac!

themeOneFaqSection.heading: Frequently asked questions
themeOneFaqSection.faqText: Can't find a suitable answer? Email

faqData.title: How to install Haydac?
faqData.content: Simply search up Haydac on Apple Store or Google Play Store and tap on Download.

faqData.title: Do you have a free trail?
faqData.content: Using Haydac is completely free. Patronizing the local businesses on Haydac may not be free but at least finding them is.

faqData.title: Can i get support from Customer Service?
faqData.content: Yes you definitely can. Send us an email or give us a call using the contact details provided and we will answer all your questions.

faqDataTwo.title: How can I edit my personal information?
faqDataTwo.content: Click on your profile on the home page and tap on 'Edit Information', fill in the necessary fields and click save.

faqDataTwo.title: Inaccurate Business information or App Malfunction?
faqDataTwo.content: If you find that the information on any page is wrong or the app is not working as expected? Fill out Haydac's contact form and we will push a fix accordingly
